Author: rdnvl
Text: When I find myself being rude to people I'll either make myself some calming herbal tea, take some time to be alone, nap, or use [this](https://www.auracacia.com/aura-cacia-tranquility-essential-oil-blend-0-5-fl-oz/) oil blend on my chest and nose and instantly I'm much calmer! Obviously the most ideal solution is to eat more but sometimes it's not that easy and we just need something to ease the hanger when we can't make ourselves eat.
